thread.title: Shani Davis Finishes Off the Podium, On His Terms

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Shani Davis Finishes Off the Podium, On His Terms
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—Of all the athletes caught up in the U.S. speedskating team’s debacle at the 2014 Olympic Games, perhaps none took it harder than Shani Davis. As one of the most accomplished skaters in the world, he had hopes of picking up two more golds, booking his place among the greatest American Olympians of all time.
He went home with none.
That’s...
